item.title: Many Factors Affecting Optimization
item.description: 机器学习的一般步骤 Model Bias The model is too simple. find a needle in a haystack (大海捞针) but there is no needle Solution: redesign your model to make it more flexible more features more neurons, layers Optimization Issue Large loss not always imply model bias. There is another possibility … A needle is in a haystack…, Just cannot find
